column4: Hi, someone helped me earlier and was awsome, I have another question before I make the switch and Havent found an answer on the web as of yet. On windows I use wampserver2 an all in one package for apache/php/mysql is there such a package for kubuntu or will I need to install these seperately on my own to create a local enviroment for web development?
oh thats great news guys, i imagine i'll be able to find it in the package manager once I install.
Just keep this page handy, it covers a number of ways: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ApacheMySQLPHP
